data.strFullDescription:
[p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/774791/extras/6fb4d9c8c642313af4842a4290ae499e.poster.avif?t=1732133384" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/774791/extras/6fb4d9c8c642313af4842a4290ae499e.webm?t=1732133384"][/imgvid][/p][p]Bob’s life is in your hand! It’s time to slip into your scrubs and grab the nearest scalpel (saw or sink plunger), and enter the Bossa Labs Medical Facility in this physics based operating theatre of chaos.[/p][p][/p][p]Take on the cream of the medical establishment in riotous competitive challenges and play frantically blood-splattered games in Surgeon Simulator 2’s rib-tickling Campaign Mode.[/p][p][/p][p]In [b]Story Mode[/b] you perform operations, opening ribcages, choosing transplant organs, making sure Bob doesn’t bleed out – it’s a barrage of botch jobs which will test every element of your surgical skills. As the pressure to keep the patient alive mounts, you must work like a well oiled machine, choosing to help, or hinder, the life-saving efforts in this unique and pandemonium pumped game.[/p][p]
 [/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/774791/extras/6eaaf7f277a3ecac270f6dffeda35a01.poster.avif?t=1732133384" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/774791/extras/6eaaf7f277a3ecac270f6dffeda35a01.webm?t=1732133384"][/imgvid][/p][p]In [b]Campaign Mode[/b] Reveal the truth behind the mysterious medical facility with a plot crafted by award winning writer Rhianna Pratchett which has more twists than Bob’s intestines. [/p][p][/p][p]Nothing is ever straight-forward including head transplants – who would have known? The Bossa Labs Medical Facility is as much a character in this game as your fellow surgeons and seems to be totally trying to sabotage your surgical career with its labyrinthine corridors, devious puzzles and tricky traps.[/p][p][/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/774791/extras/581dc71b1cc59f3d69aae6a3af0c95e0.poster.avif?t=1732133384" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/774791/extras/581dc71b1cc59f3d69aae6a3af0c95e0.webm?t=1732133384"][/imgvid][/p][p]From space stations to discos, bowling alleys to carnivals, your fellow surgeons have been creating some incredible and unlikely scenarios for surgical procedures – and they are all yours to play in with more levels and games being created all the time! Jump in and let the adventure begin![/p][p][/p][p][i]Publishers note: prior to the transfer of Surgeon Simulator 2 from publisher tinyBuild to Infogrames multiplayer functionality was removed from this game. The team at Infogrames is currently evaluating this decision. For the foreseeable future the title remains a fun, irreverently funny romp through the world of high-stakes surgery.[/i] 
[/p][p]
[/p]
data.strSnippet: It’s time to ‘scrub in’ in this physics-based surgery sim. Unearth the mysteries of the Bossa Labs Medical Facility and save Bob’s life.
